vlive.english: It's too bad. - What time is it now?

examples.korean: That's too bad. I really like the style and cut, but red is just not my color. 발음듣기 아쉽네요, 모양이랑 재단은 아주 마음에 드는데, 빨간색이 나한테 맞지 않아서요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: That's too bad. I really like the style and cut, but red is just not my color. 발음

examples.korean: It's too bad we have to part like this. 발음듣기 이렇게 헤어지려니 너무 아쉽네요 Neungyule
examples.english: It's too bad we have to part like this. 발음

examples.korean: I'm sorry the job interview didn't work out. 발음듣기 면접이 잘 안 돼서 아쉽네요. Neungyule
examples.english: I'm sorry the job interview didn't work out. 발음

examples.korean: That's too bad. Those would be too big for me. 발음듣기 아쉽네요. 그 싸이즈는 제게 너무 클 텐데요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: That's too bad. Those would be too big for me. 발음

examples.korean: Too bad you didn't stay a bit longer and learn to speak French. 발음듣기 좀더 오래 있으면서 프랑스어를 배우지 못한 게 아쉽네요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Too bad you didn't stay a bit longer and learn to speak French. 발음
